content.rendered:
For those of you that may not know what we do at Baloota, we really wanted to take the time to tell you everything you need to know about some of the best apps available for Android utility users.

A photo vault is a mobile photo & video security app that hides & protects most of the media stored on your smartphone or tablet. In the online world where it is becoming more and more uncertain on how your content is being used and knowing who has or could possibly have access to your content along with so many unknown illegal online activities that could potentially pose a threat to your security every day, it’s important to have a safeguard for your most precious memories and personal content.

By locking your photos, videos and files in a secure vault which is backed by end-to-end encryption and passcodes, you could minimise the risk a photo vault app hack.

Photos vaults aren’t just for these of us that is all too aware of the risks associated with being active line. Photo vaults also act as an additional layer of personal privacy for those of us who tend to let others use their devices. This can span from minors to work colleagues.

Why Should I Use a Photo Vault?

The traditional use of a photo vault is to hide private or sensitive photos or videos so it’s not able to be found in your main photo gallery on your phone. However, the benefits of using a photo vault go farther than just hiding photos. We wanted to add that photo vaults can be used to protect files. With Cover, your photo vault can also be used as extra storage just in case you replace your device. Not to mention, you’re also securing personal information away from any potential threats. 

Cover Photo Vault

Cover allows you to hide pictures by locking them in a secret vault on your Android device. You can have a double layer of security by locking individual albums if you prefer. Photo vault app hack is further prevented by the option to use a privat secure passcode or a finger print. The privacy app includes:

Auto-Hide™

Cover’s Auto-Hide™ is an innovative image detection AI that automatically scans devices for inappropriate images & videos and secures them in a private vault.

Real-Time Protection™

Real-Time Protection™ means your device will be protected 24/7. Once Cover is installed, it will constantly monitor activity for incoming or hidden sensitive content.

Message Protection

Cover even has your messages protected. Cover will automatically block or “cover” any inappropriate photos or videos sent via Messenger, Whatsapp, Telegram, Wechat, Viber, Line, and more.

Smart Notifications

If Cover detects sensitive content, you’ll be subtly notified immediately.

Easy to Use

To use Cover, simply install the app from the Google Play Store, grant the app access to store content in your encrypted vault, and let Cover take care of the rest. Internet access isn’t even required!

Hide Your Private Photos & Videos Today!
